channel.title: Npc help
channel.description: i was wondering if anyone knows a code to stop the npc's from dieing before they should. example: a man has 7/7 hp if i hit a 3 on it, it will die with 4/7 hp left. before it is not a npc.cfg probelm!. also this only happens when theres more than 2 people online

item.title: Npc help
item.dc:creator: @killamess killamess
item.description:
@killamess wrote:

[quote=“akanaz, post:4, topic:175689”]Search for the npc id in your npchandler and maybe you will find something there. If its not in your npc.cfg, it has to be in there.[/quote]yea i no its is there but i cant figure it out[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 26-01-2008, 01:38:07[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic

item.title: Npc help
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Search for the npc id in your npchandler and maybe you will find something there. If its not in your npc.cfg, it has to be in there.

Read full topic

that still doesnt solve this probelm, my npcs cant be over killed, so its not that reason either
